mapper.insert: insert into tbl_rule (univ, track, basic, applied, industry) values (#{univ}, #{track}, #{basic}, #{applied}, #{industry})
mapper.select: select univ, track, basic, applied, industry from tbl_rule where ruleNo = #{ruleNo}
mapper.update: update tbl_rule set univ=#{univ}, track=#{track}, basic=#{basic}, applied=#{applied}, industry=#{industry} where ruleNo=#{ruleNo}
mapper.select: select ruleNo, univ, track, basic, applied, industry from tbl_rule where ruleNo > 0 order by ruleNo desc
